0.2.1.name: wordpress/barack-obama-sidebar-widget
0.2.1.description:
Adds a Barack Obama badge widget for use in your WordPress sidebar. The widget displays an Obama emblem and the latest news from the official Barack Obama blog (the feed and title can be customized through the widget options). Now with 7 badge images to choose from!

Tested on WordPress 2.3 - WordPress 3.3.1.

  • Fixed character encoding problems in version 0.6.1
